summary: This FBI electronic communication documents the closure of case 272-SJ-3262541, which was initiated to support potential public corruption targets discovered during an IRS-CI investigation into money movement through Southern Trust international banking entity after Jeffrey Epstein's death. The IRS-CI is closing its portion, and the USAO for the District of the Virgin Islands will not pursue the matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual whose financial activities prompted investigation
persons.context: The investigation was initiated to examine the movement of money through Southern Trust international banking entity after his death.

events.title: Case Closure Communication
events.description: FBI drafts an electronic communication to close case 272-SJ-3262541, as IRS-CI is closing its portion and the USAO for the District of the Virgin Islands will not pursue the matter.

keyFacts: The FBI case 272-SJ-3262541 was initiated to support potential public corruption targets discovered during an IRS-CI investigation into money movement through Southern Trust international banking entity after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The IRS-CI has confirmed they are closing their portion of the investigation.
The USAO for the District of the Virgin Islands will not be pursuing this matter, and all evidence issues have been resolved.
